mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.p_id AS "pId", a.bid AS "bid", a.num_iid AS "numIid", a.outer_sku_id AS "outerSkuId", a.product_no AS "productNo", a.inner_size AS "innerSize", a.outer_size AS "outerSize", a.tag_price AS "tagPrice", a.agent_price AS "agentPrice", a.agent_agio AS "agentAgio", a.agent_expect_num AS "agentExpectNum", a.agent_payment AS "agentPayment", a.channel_price AS "channelPrice", a.channel_agio AS "channelAgio", a.channel_send_num AS "channelSendNum", a.commission_fee AS "commissionFee", a.channel_received_fee AS "channelReceivedFee", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
